Actions.Text: REFERRED TO ETHICS AND INTERNAL GOVERNANCE
REFERRED TO ETHICS AND INTERNAL GOVERNANCE

Title: Prohibits certain functions whenever the legislature is in session
Summary: Prohibits certain functions within a fifteen mile radius of the New York state Capitol whenever the legislature is in session.
LawCode: Add ยง1-m-1, amd ยง1-o, Leg L; amd ยง14-126, El L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the legislative law and the election law, in relation to prohibiting certain functions whenever the legislature is in session
